content_handlers: id int unsigned not null auto_increment unique primary key comment 'primary key used for identification'
handler_module varchar(200) not null comment 'identifier for the module providing the handler'
handler_name varchar(200) comment 'human readable name of the page handler'
path_prefix varchar(500) not null unique comment 'path prefix identifying this page handler'
modules: id int unsigned not null auto_increment unique primary key comment 'primary key used for identification'
module_name varchar(200) not null unique comment 'machine readable name for the module'
module_path varchar(500) comment 'name of the module'
enabled boolean not null default false
alias: id int unsigned not null auto_increment unique primary key comment 'unique identifier'
source_url varchar(500) not null comment 'the source page'
alias varchar(500) not null unique comment 'page alias'
content_types: id int unsigned not null auto_increment unique primary key comment 'primary key used for identification'
content_type_name varchar(200) not null unique comment 'name of the content type'
content_handler varchar(200) not null comment 'name of the associated content handler type'
description text comment 'human readable content type description'
cms_users: id int unsigned not null auto_increment unique primary key
date_changed timestamp default current_timestamp on update current_timestamp
cms_user_auth: id int unsigned not null unique auto_increment primary key
session: session_id int unsigned not null unique auto_increment primary key
user_id int unsigned not null unique
